text.en: Privacy Policy

text.en: Information We Collect
We collect the following information through our app:

_ww-text_text.en: We collect the following information through our app:

text.en: Personal Identifiers: Name, phone number, address, ID proof

_ww-text_text.en: Personal Identifiers: Name, phone number, address, ID proof

text.en: Photos & Videos: Of animals, your feeding/rescue work

_ww-text_text.en: Photos & Videos: Of animals, your feeding/rescue work

text.en: Location: Manually submitted (used for mapping help areas)

_ww-text_text.en: Location: Manually submitted (used for mapping help areas)

text.en: Forms Data: From adoption, rescue, lost/found, NGO registration

_ww-text_text.en: Forms Data: From adoption, rescue, lost/found, NGO registration

text.en: Veterinary Information: Provided voluntarily by clinics/vets

_ww-text_text.en: Veterinary Information: Provided voluntarily by clinics/vets

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInUp { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

text.en: Facilitate adoption/rescue/medical cases
We use the information to:
Contact users for verification, follow-ups, and animal safety checks

_ww-text_text.en: Contact users for verification, follow-ups, and animal safety checks

text.en: Display relevant posts to others for support

_ww-text_text.en: Display relevant posts to others for support

text.en: Improve app functionality and community safety

_ww-text_text.en: Improve app functionality and community safety

text.en: We do not sell or rent your personal data.

_ww-text_text.en: We do not sell or rent your personal data.

text.en: We may share your data:
With NGOs, rescuers, and coordinators for on-ground help

_ww-text_text.en: With NGOs, rescuers, and coordinators for on-ground help

text.en: With government authorities or legal entities if required by law

_ww-text_text.en: With government authorities or legal entities if required by law

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInUp { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

text.en: Stored securely on cloud infrastructure (AWS)
Backed up and hosted in India or globally

_ww-text_text.en: Backed up and hosted in India or globally

text.en: Retained while account is active or for legal/operational needs

_ww-text_text.en: Retained while account is active or for legal/operational needs

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeInUp { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

text.en: Industry-standard technical and organizational measures are implemented

_ww-text_text.en: Industry-standard technical and organizational measures are implemented

text.en: Absolute security cannot be guaranteed over the internet

_ww-text_text.en: Absolute security cannot be guaranteed over the internet

text.en: Available to global users
Data may be transferred to India or other countries via secure cloud

_ww-text_text.en: Data may be transferred to India or other countries via secure cloud

text.en: Usage implies consent to this transfer

_ww-text_text.en: Usage implies consent to this transfer

text.en: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data

_ww-text_text.en: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data

text.en: You can opt out of communication via email

_ww-text_text.en: You can opt out of communication via email

text.en: Animal Mitra does not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13 without parental consent.

_ww-text_text.en: Animal Mitra does not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13 without parental consent.
